title: Supreme Court sides with Sen. Ted Cruz in campaign finance case - NPR
content:
1. Supreme Court sides with Sen. Ted Cruz in campaign finance case  NPR
  2. Supreme Court chips away at campaign finance regulation â€” thanks to Ted Cruz  POLITICO
  3. Court sides with Ted Cruz and strikes down campaign-finance restriction along ideological lines  SCOTUSblog
  4. Supreme Court sides with Ted Cruz in campaign finance lawsuit  The Texas Tribune
  5. Supreme Court Sides With Ted Cruz In Campaign Finance Case  Forbes
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: At issue was a federal law that has been on the books for 20 years that barred federal candidates from raising more than $250,000 to repay loans made to their campaigns.
